title: Morg gets an Amumu ult at level 1.
body:
"balanced" 

The one loss was because an exposed nexus was open multiple times for our yi to tele in and kill it in 4 shots. he decided against it. each time he'd get caught out and force us to defend. or farm the jungle until the inhibs respawned. he was a superb player and riot should gift him a mystery gift for being so good at this game. he was sportsmen like to not play the game properly and give up a free win on multiple occasions. Chat restrict the ones that tell him he's a shitter because they're the ones you dont want in your games, punish that 30/0 anivia that has no clue what they're doing and reward this yi. keep up the good work, riot ! :D

~~this is secretly an i hate morg, riot's balance team, riot's disciplinary actions and yi players, all in one post.~~

godbless.
